data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Kepulauan Riau, Indonesia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kepulauan Riau, Indonesia

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kepulauan Riau who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kepulauan Riau to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 56,077 believers in Kepulauan Riau to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hindi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,747,800 people living in Kepulauan Riau through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Kepulauan Riau.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kepulauan Riau.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
